Doctor is very polite *** ******** ******* ******** *** ********* ***** He does not want me to come again for same problem instead he advised me to cure it by myself by daily walking or swimming. Swimming is only the best exercise for back pain.

I went for my father n he took it as a challenge to cure without surgery n he made it possible within very short period of time. 
He never tries to evade any queries from us n he always give us straight answers.
